name: Star Caps
description: This is the website for Star Caps, a local hat store in Houston. The goal of this project was to grow the online presence of the store. As the team is small, the focus was to create an online product catalog rather than establishing a full e-commerce solution.

name: Lumikha Arts Showcase
description: This application showcases information about Unipro Texas' 2nd annual arts showcase. I was commissioned to build a digital pamphlet to aid Unipro in their efforts to decrease paper waste and lessen the environmental impact of the event. Event attendees were able to utilize QR codes throughout the venue to access information about the event, including artists, performers, and the schedule.

name: Portfolio V1
stack: React | Bootstrap | SASS | Node.js | Axios | Express.js
description: The first iteration of my portfolio!

name: Pacer TMS
stack: HTML5 | CSS3 | ES6 | Bootstrap | BCrypt | Node.js | Express.js | Handlebars.js | MySQL | Sequelize | Passport.js
description: Pacer Transportation Management System is an application that manages complex inventory systems. It's capabilities range from tracking simple product movement to detailed inventory control. This version of the application was created from the perspective of a pipe manufacturer, however the application can be customized to fit any type of transport management need.

name: Social Animals
stack: React | Material Design for Bootstrap | MongoDB | Mongoose.js | Passport.js | Axios | Express.js | BCrypt | Node.js
description: Social Animals is a part social networking/part search service application for animal lovers. It aims to reduce the amount of animals that are abandoned or surrendered by providing a support network of animal related information and resources.

name: Train Scheduler
stack: HTML5 | CSS3 | Bootstrap | ES5 | jQuery | Firebase | Moment.js
description: Train Scheduler provides up to date arrival and departure information for various trains. Users can add trains to the tracking list by filling out the form underneath the table.

name: Adventure TIme Clicky Game
description: A memory game where the goal is to NOT click on the same picture twice.
